UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Discovery of novel antibacterial agent for the infected wound treatment: all-hydrocarbon stapling optimization of LL-37
Literature.Author: Zhang Y, Zheng M, Wang Z, Liu Z, Chen S, Li X, Shi Y, Chu H

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=256µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=256µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=256µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=128µg/ml)
